H0.text: Who created Rumpole of the Bailey. P.D. James

H1.text: Who created Rumpole of the Bailey. Tom Stoppard

H2.text: Who created Rumpole of the Bailey. Agatha Christie

H3.text: Who created Rumpole of the Bailey. John mortimer

A4.text: He is best known for short stories about a barrister named Horace Rumpole, adapted from episodes of the TV series Rumpole of the Bailey also written by Mortimer.

A5.text: Mortimer created Rumpole for a BBC Play For Today in 1975.
